Posts.Content: May 27, 2011 02:26AM clr wrote: Thanks Lisa. I will ask about the MRI when I go next week. I'm sure you're anxiously awaiting your results - I expect to be where you are right now in a couple of weeks. (this long holiday weekend couldn't have come at a worse time- the waiting is just brutal) I hope that all will come back ok for you.
Posts.Title: birad 4 with 3 complex cysts clr clr

Posts.Content: clr wrote: I'm so sorry to hear the worry that everyone is going through.  Until this past week, I never could have imagined how consuming it is.  I have been a mess and in a fog.  I went for a routine mammo last week and was called back for diag. mammo and ultrasound.  I was expecting everything to be ok but it came back as birad 4 with 3 complex cysts 6-8mm of left- I can see the solid debris within the cyst on the US that has them concerned. I am seeing a surgeon in a week (originally they gave me an apt. in 2 weeks, but I kept calling back to say I couldn't wait that long!)  My gyno said that since they are 3, he's not sure how they will approach biopsy.  Has anyone got a 2nd opinion prior to diagnosis (ie. what is the best way to biopsy).  Also, would you think that they should also US the right breast - I have very dense breasts. Log in to post a reply
